name: We will be heard
description:
This game was created during Unity event : The Cross-Cultural Impact Jam.

The main theme of this jam was "Amplifying Voices".

We came up with the idea to split the game in 3 part :

  • Part 1 : Pick a cause and a character.
  •  Part 2 : Travel the city and gather people sharing the same cause as yours to break barriers.
  • Part 3 : Learn more about the cause you defended and unlock the other ones.

Controls : WASD to move, Space to break barriers, H to open the causes book in Part 3.

This game was created by :

  • Neelesh Nair - Narrative Designer, Art Direction (neelnair)
  • Aira San Agustin - Researcher, Programmer, Audio (ai-dani)
  • Arthur Dugué - Lead Programmer (GrommelGod)
  • Mamadou Niang - Location Consultant

Check out the other games created by our fellow participants : UnityPlay
